translation: There are 1,716 collections in total.

translation: The above is a summary of the 638 sections, 2,745 volumes, and 248 books of Mahāyāna scriptures and vinaya treatises, which are listed here by title and number of pages, and the rest are listed in the extensive records.

source_sentence: 一千八百八十卷。
translation: One thousand eight hundred and eighty volumes.

translation: The Daoxing banruo boluomi jing is in ten volumes (one volume is titled the mohe boruo boluomi daoxing jing or eight volumes; it's also called the banruo daoxing pin jing), one hundred and seventy pages, ten volumes of the xiaopin banruo boluomi jing (one volume is titled the mohe boruo boluomi jing without the xiaopin characters), one hundred and fifty pages, four volumes of the damingdu jing (also directly titled the damingdu jing or six volumes), ninety-four pages, seven volumes of the victorious god king banruo boluomi jing (one hundred and twenty-five pages), and eleven volumes of the two preceding scriptures in the same volume.

source_sentence: 大寶積經一百二十卷(四十九會說合成一部十二帙一千九百九十一紙)大方廣三戒經三卷四十六紙無量清淨平等覺經二卷(亦直云無量清淨經或四卷)六十一紙阿彌陀經二卷(上卷題云佛說諸佛阿彌陀三耶三佛薩樓佛檀過度人道經亦名無量壽經)五十五紙無量壽經二卷三十九紙上四經九卷同帙。
translation: One hundred and twenty rolls of the Mahābherī Sutra (forty-nine sermons combined into twelve books of one thousand nine hundred and ninety-one pages), three rolls of the Mahābherī Sutra of the Three Precepts, forty-six pages of the Immeasurable Pureness and Equal Enlightenment Sutra, two rolls (also called the Immeasurable Pureness Sutra or four rolls), sixty-one pages of the Amitâbha Sutra, two rolls (the title of the preceding roll says that the Buddhas taught the Amitâbha Trāyastriṃśa-sarvâstivāda and the Humane Life Sutra, also called the Sutra of Immeasurable Life), fifty-five pages of the Sutra of Immeasurable Life, two rolls, thirty-nine pages, and nine rolls of the preceding four scriptures in the same book.

source_sentence: 慧上菩薩問大善權經二卷(或一卷或直云大善權經或云方便所度无極經或云慧上菩薩經或云善權方便經)三十二紙大乘顯識經二卷二十五紙大乘方等要慧經一卷一紙彌勒菩薩所問本願經一卷(或無所問字亦云彌勒本願經一名彌勒難經)八紙佛遺日摩尼寶經一卷(一名古品遺日說般若經一名大寶積經一名摩訶衍寶嚴經)一十六紙摩訶衍寶嚴經一卷(一名大迦葉品)二十紙勝鬘師子吼一乘大方便方廣經一卷(亦直名勝鬘經或二卷)十九紙毘耶娑問經二卷三十四紙上八經十一卷同帙。

source_sentence: 大方等大集經三十卷(三帙或二十九卷或三十一卷或三十二卷或四十卷)六百二十一紙大方等大集日藏經十卷(一帙題云大乘大方等日藏分或十二卷或十五卷)二百六紙大集月藏經十卷(一帙題云大集經月藏分第十二或十二卷或十五卷)二百一十九紙大乘大集地藏十輪經十卷(一帙)一百六十五紙大方廣十輪經八卷一百九紙大集須彌藏經三卷(內題云大乘大集經須彌藏分第十五或二卷)三十八紙上二經十一卷同帙。
translation: 大方等大集經三十卷(三帙或二十九卷或三十一卷或三十二卷或四十卷)六百二十一紙大方等大集日藏經十卷(一帙題云大乘大方等日藏分或十二卷或十五卷)二百六紙大集月藏經十卷(一帙題云大集經月藏分第十二或十二卷或十五卷)二百一十九紙大乘大集地藏十輪經十卷(一帙)一百六十五紙大方廣十輪經八卷一百九紙大集須彌藏經三卷(內題云大乘大集經須彌藏分第十五或二卷)三十八紙上二經十一卷同帙。

source_sentence: 虛空藏菩薩經一卷(一名虛空藏經)二十七紙虛空藏菩薩神呪經一卷一十七紙虛空孕菩薩經二卷三十一紙觀虛空藏菩薩經一卷(亦名虛空藏觀經或無觀字)三紙菩薩念佛三昧經六卷(或無菩薩字或五卷)九十八紙上五經十一卷同帙。

source_sentence: 大方等大集菩薩念佛三昧經十卷(題云大方等大集經菩薩念佛三昧分一帙)一百三十四紙般舟三昧經三卷(一名十方現在佛悉在前立定經或云大般舟三昧經或二卷)五十紙拔陂菩薩經一卷(亦云拔波安錄云颰披陀菩薩經)一十四紙大方等大集賢護經五卷(或六卷題云大方等大集經賢護分亦云賢護菩薩經亦直云賢護經)八十二紙上三經九卷同帙。
translation: The Daifangdaji pusa nianfo sanmei jing in ten volumes (titled Daifangdaji jing pusa nianfo sanmei fen in one volume), the 134-page Banzhou sanmei jing in three volumes (a scripture of the present buddha in ten directions standing in front of concentration, or the Daifangzhou sanmei jing, or two volumes), the 50-page Bapei pusa jing in one volume (also called Bapoan lu yun bao pida pusa jing), the 14-page Daifangdaji xianhu jing in five volumes (or six volumes titled Daifangdaji xianhu fen, also called xianhu pusa jing, or simply called xianhu jing), and the 82-page Shangzhao jing in three scriptures and nine volumes in the same volume.

source_sentence: 阿差末經七卷(晉曰無盡意或四卷或五卷或云阿差末菩薩經)九十二紙無盡意菩薩經六卷(初題云大集經中無盡意所說不可盡義品第二十二亦云阿差末經或直云無盡意經)八十九紙上二經十三卷同帙。
translation: Seven Fascicle Sutra of Ajātaśatru (Jin Translation: Sutra of the Endless Mind, or Four Fascicle, or Five Fascicle, or Ajātaśatru Bodhisattva Sutra); Ninety-two Fascicle Sutra of the Endless Mind Bodhisattva; Six Fascicle Sutra of the Endless Mind Bodhisattva (First titled, Sutra of the Great Collection, the Twenty-second Chapter of the Inexhaustible Meaning of the Sutra of the Endless Mind, also called the Ajātaśatru Sutra, or simply the Endless Mind Sutra); Eighty-nine Fascicle, Two Fascicle, Thirteen Fascicle, and One Fascicle.

source_sentence: 大集譬喻王經二卷(或無大集字)三十四紙大哀經八卷(或云如來大哀經或六卷或七卷)一百一十七紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: Daji mieyao wang jing 2 rolls (or without the word Daji) 34 pages Daji jing 8 rolls (or as the Tathāgata daji jing or 6 or 7 rolls) 117 pages on top of 2 sūtras in 10 rolls of the same book.

source_sentence: 寶女所問經三卷(或直云寶女經亦云寶女問慧經亦云寶女三昧經或四卷)六十四紙無言童子經二卷(或云無言菩薩經或一卷)四十一紙自在王菩薩經二卷(或無菩薩字)三十四紙奪迅王問經二卷四十一紙上四經九卷同帙。
translation: Jewel Girl's Questions Sutra, three volumes (or just the Jewel Girl Sutra, the Jewel Girl's Questions to Wisdom Sutra, the Jewel Girl's Samādhi Sutra, or four volumes), sixty-four pages of the Boy Without Words Sutra, two volumes (or the Boy Without Words Sutra, or one volume), forty-one pages of the Zizaiwang Pusa Sutra, two volumes (or without the word pusa), thirty-four pages of the Nuxun Wang's Questions Sutra, two volumes, forty-one pages, and the upper four sūtras, nine volumes, all in one volume.

source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經十卷(或八卷一帙)一百三十三紙大方廣佛華嚴經六十卷(八會說舊譯六帙或五十卷)一千七十九紙大方廣佛花嚴經八十卷(九會說新譯八帙)一千三百二十九紙信力入印法門經五卷九十五紙度諸佛境界智光嚴經一卷(或二卷)一十七紙佛花嚴入如來德智不思議境界經二卷二十二紙大方廣入如來智德不思議經一卷一十四紙大方廣佛華嚴經不思議佛境界分一卷(或二卷)一十二紙大方廣如來不思議境界經一卷一十一紙大乘金剛髻珠菩薩修行分一卷(亦名金剛鬘菩薩加行品)一十八紙大方廣佛花嚴經修慈分一卷(七紙)上八經十三卷同帙。
translation: Dhāraṇī of the Precious Star ten rolls (or eight rolls in one volume) one hundred and thirty-three paper.

source_sentence: 大方廣普賢所說經一卷(別有一本向三十紙非是本經應須揀擇)五紙莊嚴菩提心經一卷七紙大方廣菩薩十地經一卷七紙兜沙經一卷五紙菩薩本業經一卷(亦直名本業經亦名淨行品經)一十二紙諸菩薩求佛本業經一卷(或無諸字)一十一紙菩薩十住行道品一卷(亦直云菩薩十住)八紙菩薩十住經一卷五紙漸備一切智德經五卷(或十卷一名十住又名大慧光三昧)一百五紙上九經十三卷同帙。
translation: The Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra in one volume (there is a separate sūtra that goes up to thirty pages that is not the original sūtra and should be selected), the Dhāraṇī of the Adorned Mind in one volume, the Dhāraṇī of the Ten Stages in seven volumes, the Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra in one volume, the Dhāraṇī of the Tuṣita in five volumes, the Sutra of the Bodhisattva's Primary Activities in one volume (also known as the Sutra of Primary Activities and the Sutra of the Chapter on Pure Conduct), the Sutra of the Ten Stages in one volume, and the Sutra of the Bodhisattva's Ten Stages in eight volumes.

source_sentence: 十住經四卷(或五卷)九十七紙
translation: The Sutra of the Ten Stages in Four (or Five) Fascicles of Ninety-seven Papers

source_sentence: 等目菩薩所問三昧經二卷(或三卷一名普賢菩薩定意或直云等目菩薩經)五十二紙顯無邊佛土功德經一卷二紙如來興顯經四卷(一名興顯如幻經)六十六紙上四經十一卷同帙。
translation: The Samādhi Sutra of the Questions of the Samantabhadra Bodhisattva (or three volumes, a scripture on the meditative intent of the Samantabhadra Bodhisattva, or simply the Samantabhadra Sutra of the Samantabhadra Bodhisattva) of fifty-two pages, the Sutra on the Merit of the Buddha Land (one volume, two pages), the Sutra on the Emergence of the Tathāgata (four volumes, a scripture on the Emergence of the Tathāgata as Illusion) of sixty-six pages, and the eleven volumes of the four scriptures above in the same volume.

source_sentence: 度世品經六卷(或五卷或無品字)一百二十紙羅摩伽經三卷(或四卷)七十二紙大方廣佛花嚴經續入法界品一卷(或無續字)八紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Gaṇḍavyūhasūtra in six rolls (or five rolls, or without the character pin), the Rāmagha Sutra in three rolls (or four rolls), and the Dafangguang fo huayan jing in one roll (or without the character pin), the upper three sūtras in ten rolls of eight pages, are all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 大般涅槃經四十卷(或三十六卷四帙)七百三十紙大般涅槃經後譯荼毘分二卷(亦云闍維分亦云後分)三十九紙大般泥洹經六卷(記云方等大般泥洹經或七卷一百四十一紙)上二經八卷同帙。
translation: The 40-volume (or 36-volume, four-volume) 730-page Latter Portion of the Sutra on the Great Decease (also called the Latter Portion of the Sutra on the Great Decease) and the 39-page Latter Portion of the Sutra on the Great Decease (also called the Latter Portion of the Sutra on the Great Decease) are six volumes (also called the Equanimous Great Decease, or seven volumes, 141 pages), and the eight volumes of the two preceding scriptures are the same.

source_sentence: 方等般泥洹經二卷(亦名大般泥洹經或三卷四十五紙)四童子三昧經三卷(或無三昧字)四十四紙大悲經五卷八十七紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: The following two sūtras are in the same volume: the two-fascicle Mahāparinirvāṇa-sūtra (also called the Mahāparinirvāṇa-sūtra or three volumes of forty-five pages), the three-volume Four Children Samādhi-sūtra (or without the word samādhi), and the forty-four-page Great Compassion Sūtra (or five volumes of eighty-seven pages).

source_sentence: 方廣大莊嚴經十二卷(一名神通遊戲或云大方廣)二百一十四紙普曜經八卷(一名方等本起)一百四十三紙上二經二十卷兩帙。
translation: The Sutra of Extensive Adornment (a sūtra of supernormal powers or called Extensive in Extensive Form) is twelve rolls long, two hundred and fourteen pages long, and the Sutra of Universal Luminosity is eight rolls long (a scripture that originated in the Vairocana school), one hundred and forty-three pages long, and the upper two scriptures are twenty rolls and two books long.

source_sentence: 法花三昧經一卷一十一紙
translation: The Dharma Flower Samādhi Sutra is one volume and one eleven pages.

source_sentence: 無量義經一卷一十七紙
translation: Wuliangyi jing (Wuliangyi jing) 1 roll, 17 pages

source_sentence: 薩曇分陀利經一卷(舊錄云薩芸芬陀利經亦直云分陀利經)三紙妙法蓮花經八卷(或七卷二十八品僧祐錄云新法花經一百五十二紙)上四經十一卷同帙。
translation: Saddharma-puṇḍarīka-sūtra in one volume (Old Record: Sayun-puṇḍarīka-sūtra, also known as the Puṇḍarīka-sūtra), three papers, eight rolls of the Lotus Sutra of the Wonderful Dharma (or seven rolls and twenty-eight grades of the Saṃyuktâgama-saṃyuktâgama-sūtra, one hundred and fifty-two papers), and eleven rolls of the above four sūtras in the same volume.

source_sentence: 正法花經十卷(或云方等正法花或七卷一帙)一百九十紙添品妙法蓮花經七卷(二十七品寶塔天授連為一品或八卷)一百五十八紙維摩詰所說經三卷(一名不可思議解脫或直云維摩詰經僧祐錄云新維摩詰經)六十一紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: The Lotus Sutra of the True Dharma in ten rolls (or seven rolls in one, as the Sutra of the True Dharma is called), the Lotus Sutra of the Lotus of the Fine Dharma in seven rolls (or eight rolls in one, as the twenty-seven-piece jeweled stūpa is called), and the Vimalakīrti Sutra in three rolls (an inconceivable liberation, or simply the Vimalakīrti Sutra, as the Saṃyuktâgama records call it), the upper two sūtras in ten rolls of sixty-one pages, all in one.

source_sentence: 維摩詰經二卷(維摩詰說不思議法門之稱一名佛法普入道門三昧經或三卷)五十五紙說無垢稱經六卷九十七紙大方等頂王經一卷(一名維摩詰子問經亦名善思童子經亦直云頂王經)二十紙大乘頂王經一卷(亦云維摩呪經)一十六紙上四經十卷同帙。
translation: Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra 2 vols. (Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra or Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra); Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra 6 vols. (a Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra also called Shansi-young-ja-sūtra; also called Shansi-young-ja-sūtra); Mahāyāna-young-ja-sūtra 1 vol. (also called Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra); Mahāyāna-young-ja-sūtra 1 vol. (also called Vimalakīrti-nirdeśa-sūtra); 16 pages; and 4 sūtras in 10 volumes.

source_sentence: 善思童子經二卷二十一紙
translation: Sutra of the Boy of Good Thinking (2 volumes, 21 pages)

source_sentence: 大悲分陀利經八卷(亦云大乘悲分陀利經一百六十八紙)上二經十卷同帙。
translation: Dabeifentuoli jing (also called Dasheng bei fentuoli jing, one hundred and sixty-eight pages) The above two sūtras are in ten volumes and are in the same book.

source_sentence: 悲華經十卷(一帙)一百九十九紙
translation: Compassionate Flower Scripture, 10 volumes (one volume), one hundred and ninety-nine pages.

source_sentence: 金光明最勝王經十卷(一帙)一百四十九紙合部金光明經八卷(二十四品)一百二十紙伅真陀羅所問經二卷(初云伅真陀羅所問寶如來三昧經或云伅真陀羅尼王經或三卷)五十八紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: Jin guangming zuishengwang jing ten rolls (one book) one hundred and forty-nine pages (eight rolls (twenty-four chapters) of the combined Jin guangming jing) one hundred and twenty pages (two rolls) of the Xizhendra suowen jing (first, Xizhendra suowen baos rulai sanmei jing or Xizhendrani wang jing or three rolls) fifty-eight pages (ten rolls of the above two sūtras in one book)

source_sentence: 大樹緊那羅王所問經四卷(亦名說不可思議品或云大樹緊那羅經)六十七紙佛昇忉利天為母說法經二卷(亦云佛昇忉利天品經或三卷)三十七紙道神足無極變化經四卷(一名合道神足經或二卷或五卷)四十九紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: Four Fascicle Sutra of the Questions of King Mahādruma Kiṃnara (also called the Unfathomable Chapter of the Exposition or Mahādruma Kiṃnara Sutra); Sixty-seven Fascicle Sutra of the Ascension of Buddha to the Heaven of the Thirty-three (also called the Chapter of the Ascension of Buddha to the Thirty-three); Thirty-seven Fascicle Sutra of the Spiritual Feet of the Path and the Limitless Transformations (a combined Sutra of the Spiritual Feet of the Path or two or five fascicles); Forty-nine Fascicle Sutra; Ten Fascicle Sutra; Ten Fascicle Sutra.

source_sentence: 寶雨經十卷(一帙)一百四十一紙
translation: Jewel Rain Sutra, ten volumes (one volume), one hundred and forty-one sheets of paper.

source_sentence: 寶雲經七卷一百二紙

source_sentence: 阿惟越致遮經三卷(或無遮字或四卷)六十六紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: *Abhidharma-jñānaprasthāna-sūtra (or without the word jñānaprasthāna-sūtra) in three fascicles (or without the word jñānaprasthāna or in four fascicles) of sixty-six pages and ten fascicles of the above two scriptures in one volume.

source_sentence: 不退轉法輪經四卷(一名不退轉經)七十三紙廣博嚴淨不退轉法輪經四卷(或六卷或直云廣博嚴淨經亦直云不退轉法輪經)七十八紙不必定入印經一卷(或不必定入定入印經)二十一紙入定不定印經一卷一十六紙上四經十卷同帙。
translation: Four Fascicle Sutra of the Nonretrogressing Dharma Wheel (a nonretrogressing sutra), four fascicles of the Guangbo yanjing nonretrogressing Dharma Wheel (either six fascicles or just the Guangbo yanjing sutra or just the nonretrogressing Dharma Wheel sutra), one fascicle of the 78-page Amoghasiddhi Sutra (or the Amoghasiddhi Sutra), one fascicle of the 21-page Amoghasiddhi Sutra, and ten fascicles of the 16-page Amoghasiddhi Sutra.

source_sentence: 等集眾德三昧經三卷(或二卷或無三昧字或直云等集經)五十紙集一切福德三昧經三卷五十紙持心梵天經四卷(亦云持心梵天所問經一名莊嚴佛法經又名等御諸法經凡十七品或六卷)九十一紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: The Samādhi Sutra of Equally Gathering All Virtues, three volumes (or two volumes, or without the word samādhi, or simply as the Sutra of Equally Gathering), the Samādhi Sutra of Gathering All Virtues, three volumes, and the Brahmā Sutra of Holding Hearts, four volumes (also called the Sutra of Holding Hearts and Questions of Brahmā, a scripture that adorns the Buddha's teachings, and also called the Sutra of Equally Regulating the Dharma, which contains seventeen lessons or six volumes), and the three scriptures on ninety-one pages, ten volumes, and the same book.

source_sentence: 思益梵天所問經四卷(或直云思益經僧祐錄云思益義經)八十三紙勝思惟梵天所問經六卷一百一紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: Sutra of the Questions of Viśeṣa-cinti-brahma in Four Fascicle form (also known as Sutra of the Questions of Viśeṣa-cinti-brahma, or Sutra of the Meaning of Viśeṣa-cinti-brahma in the Saṃyuktâgama-sūtra) is eighty-three pages long, and the Sutra of the Questions of Viśeṣa-cinti-brahma in Six Fascicle form is one hundred and one pages long, and the two sūtras in Ten Fascicle form are the same.

source_sentence: 持人菩薩經四卷(初云持人菩薩所問陰種諸入以了道慧經或三卷)五十四紙持世經四卷(一名法印經或三卷)七十八紙濟諸方等學經一卷(天竺薩和鞞曰僧迦或無學字)一十五紙大乘方廣總持經一卷(或無乘字)一十四紙上四經十卷同帙。
translation: The Four Fascicle Sutra of the Bodhisattva Who Holds People (first, the Sutra of the Wisdom of the Way through the Aggregates that the Bodhisattva Holds People); the Four Fascicle Sutra of the World Holder (first, the Sutra of the Dharma Seal or three fascicles); the Seventy-eight Fascicle Sutra of the Study of the Various Directions; the One Fascicle Sutra of the Saṃgha of India (or the Saṃgha of India, without the word study); the One-Fifteen Fascicle Sutra of the Zongchi of the Dasheng (or without the word vehicle); and the One-Four Fascicle Sutra, in ten volumes.

translation: Mañjuśrī's Present Jewel Store Sūtra in three rolls (or two rolls, or without the word present, or just like the Jewel Store Sūtra), the large, broad, and extensive Jewel Box Sūtra in three rolls (or two rolls), the large, broad, and extensive Mahāyāna Same Sex Sūtra in two rolls (also called the Sutra of the Knowledge of All Buddha Practices and Entrances in the Vairocana Treasury, a Buddha's Ten Stages Sutra, or four rolls), and the large, manifest Mahāyāna Sutra in two rolls (also called the Sutra of the Knowledge of All Buddha Realms in the Vairocana Treasury) on thirty-two pages, and the four sūtras and ten rolls on thirty-two pages, all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 深密解脫經五卷七十一紙
translation: The Sutra of Profound Liberation is five volumes and seventy-one pages long.

translation: Jie shenmi jing wuqie qifu xieyi jing

translation: The above two sūtras are in ten volumes and one book.

source_sentence: 解節經一卷一十紙
translation: The Jiejie jing (Jiejie jing) is one volume and ten pages long.

translation: Xiangxu jietuodi poluomi liaoyi jing one volume (or two volumes, also known as jietu jietu liaoyi jing, also directly called Xiangxu jietu jing) one eighteen paper scriptures of the primordial superior dharma of dependent arising two volumes (also directly called dependent arising jing twenty-three paper) two volumes of the primordial superior dharma gate scriptures of discriminating dependent arising (also directly called discriminating dependent arising jing) twenty-three paper Laṅkâvatāra gem scriptures four volumes ninety-two paper the upper five scriptures ten volumes in the same book.

translation: Laṅkâvatāra-sūtra, ten rolls (one volume), one hundred and seventy-four pages, seven rolls, one hundred and thirty-seven pages, seven rolls, one hundred and thirty-seven pages, three rolls, forty-seven pages, and ten rolls of the above two sūtras in the same volume.

source_sentence: 大薩遮尼乾子所說經十卷(一帙或加授記字無所說字或七卷或八卷一名菩薩境界奮迅法門經)一百三十九紙大方等大雲經六卷(一名大方等無相大雲經一名大雲無相經一名大雲蜜藏經或四卷或五卷)九十紙大雲請雨經一卷(內題云大雲經請雨品第六十四)二十三紙大雲輪請雨經二卷二十七紙大方等大雲請雨經一卷(內題云大方等大雲經請雨品第六十四)二十紙上四經十卷同帙。
translation: 大薩遮尼乾子所說經十卷(一帙或加授記字無所說字或七卷或八卷一名菩薩境界奮迅法門經)一百三十九紙大方等大雲經六卷(一名大方等無相大雲經一名大雲無相經一名大雲蜜藏經或四卷或五卷)九十紙大雲請雨經一卷(內題云大雲經請雨品第六十四)二十三紙大雲輪請雨經二卷二十七紙大方等大雲請雨經一卷(內題云大方等大雲經請雨品第六十四)二十紙上四經十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 諸法無行經二卷(或一卷)三十一紙諸法本無經三卷三十九紙無極寶三昧經一卷(或無三昧字)三十紙寶如來三昧經二卷(一名無極寶三昧經或一卷三十八紙)慧印三昧經一卷(一名寶田慧印三昧經亦直云慧印經)二十紙如來智印經一卷(一名諸佛法身)一十九紙上六經十一卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Non-Harmonizing of the Dharmas, two rolls (or one roll), thirty-one pages, the Sutra of the Non-Making of the Dharmas, three rolls, thirty-nine pages, the Sutra of the Samādhi of the Treasures, one roll (or no word for samādhi), thirty pages, the Sutra of the Samādhi of the Jeweled Tathāgatas, two rolls (one is the Samādhi Sutra of the Treasures, or one roll, thirty-eight pages), the Samādhi Sutra of the Seal of Wisdom, one roll (one is the Samādhi Sutra of the Jeweled Fields, also known as the Seal of Wisdom Sutra), twenty pages, the Seal of Wisdom of the Tathāgatas, one roll (one is the Dharma-body of the Buddhas), one nineteen pages, the above six sūtras, eleven rolls, and one book.

source_sentence: 大灌頂經十二卷(一帙或無大字錄云九卷未詳)一百一十八紙藥師如來本願經一卷(隋笈多譯)一十二紙藥師琉璃光如來本願功德經一卷一十一紙藥師琉璃光七佛本願功德經二卷三十一紙阿闍世王經二卷五十五紙普超三昧經三卷(或四卷或上加文殊師利字亦直云普超經一名阿闍世王品安公錄云更出阿闍世王經)六十八紙放鉢經一卷七紙上六經十卷同帙。
translation: One hundred and eighteen pages: Yakushi Rulai Benyuan jing (a Sui translation of the Śākyamuni sūtra), one volume: Yakushi Lurigwang Rulai Benyuan gongde jing, one volume: Yakushi Lurigwang Qifo benyuan gongde jing, two volumes: Yakushi Lurigwang Qifo benyuan gongde jing, thirty-one pages: Ajātaśatru jing, two volumes: fifty-five pages: Puchao sanmei jing, three volumes: either four or with the addition of the character Mañjuśrī, also known as Puchao jing, or one of the Ajātaśatru jing, which An Gong's record says is furthermore the Ajātaśatru jing: sixty-eight pages: Fangbo jing, one volume: seven pages: the last six sūtras, ten volumes: the same book.

source_sentence: 月燈三昧經十一卷(或十卷一帙)一百九十八紙月燈三昧經一卷(一名文殊師利菩薩行十事行經一名逮慧三昧經)一十紙無所希望經一卷(一名象步經)二十紙象腋經一卷一十六紙大淨法門經一卷(題云大淨法門品上金光首女所問溥首童真所開化經)二十四紙大莊嚴法門經二卷(亦名文殊師利神通力經亦名勝金色光明德女經)二十六紙如來莊嚴智慧光明入一切佛境界經二卷(亦云如來入一切佛境界經)三十四紙度一切諸佛境界智嚴經一卷一十二紙後出阿彌陀佛偈經一卷(或無經字)一紙觀無量壽佛經一卷(亦云無量壽觀經)一十六紙阿彌陀經一卷(亦名無量壽經)五紙稱讚淨土佛攝受經一卷(亦直云稱讚淨土經)一十紙上十一經十三卷同帙。

translation: The Dhāraṇī of the Wishful Mind of Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva is a four-page Dhāraṇī of the Wishful Wheel in one volume (this sūtra is from the Sutra of the Secret and Unobstructed Collection of the Vajra Samaya of the Great Lotus).

source_sentence: 摩利支天經一卷(或上加小字)二紙呪五首經一卷(或無經字)二紙千囀陀羅尼觀世音菩薩呪經一卷(或無經字)三紙六字神呪經一卷(或云六字呪法)六紙七俱胝佛大心准提陀羅尼經一卷(亦直云七俱胝佛母心經)五紙七俱胝佛母准泥大明陀羅尼經一卷一十六紙上九經二十卷二帙(上帙七卷下帙十三卷)。
translation: A two-page sutra of the five heads of a mantra in one volume (or without the scriptures), a two-page sutra of the Dhāraṇī of a Thousand Spaces for Avalokitêśvara in one volume (or without the scriptures), a three-page sutra of a six-syllable mantra in one volume (or as a six-syllable mantra), a six-page sutra of the Zhunti Dhāraṇī of the Great Essence of the Seven Clubs Buddha in one volume (also known as the Heart Sutra of the Seven Clubs Buddha Mother), a five-page sutra of the Zhunti Great Illuminating Dhāraṇī of the Seven Clubs Buddha Mother in one volume, a sixteen-page sutra of twenty two volumes (the first seven volumes and the second thirteen volumes), and a six-page sutra of the Dhāraṇī of the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 觀自在菩薩隨心呪經一卷(亦名多唎心經十九紙)種種雜呪經一卷(或無經字)六紙佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(杜行顗奉制譯)七紙佛頂最勝陀羅尼經一卷(日照三藏譯)八紙佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(佛陀波利譯)七紙最勝佛頂陀羅尼淨除業障經一卷(日照三藏再譯)十三紙佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(義淨三藏譯或加呪字八紙)無量門微密持經一卷(一名成道降魔得一切智經)六紙出生無量門持經一卷(或云新微密持經)七紙阿難陀目佉尼呵離陀經一卷(或云出無量門持經)一十紙無量門破魔陀羅尼經一卷(或直云破魔陀羅尼經)一十一紙阿難陀目佉尼訶離陀隣尼經一卷一十紙舍利弗陀羅尼經一卷八紙一向出生菩薩經一卷一十二紙出生無邊門陀羅尼經一卷一十四紙勝幢臂印陀羅尼經一卷二紙妙臂印幢陀羅尼經一卷(別有一本十六七紙非是本經不可流布)二紙上十七經十七卷同帙無崖際持法門經一卷(一名無際經)一十五紙尊勝菩薩所問一切法入無量門陀羅尼經一卷(或直云尊勝菩薩所問亦云入無量門陀羅尼)十七紙金剛上味陀羅尼經一卷一十五紙金剛場陀羅尼經一卷一十四紙師子奮迅菩薩所問經一卷二紙華聚陀羅尼呪經一卷三紙華積陀羅尼神呪經一卷三紙六字呪王經一卷五紙六字神呪王經一卷六紙虛空藏菩薩問佛經一卷(亦云虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經亦云七佛神呪經)十二紙如來方便善巧呪經一卷十紙持句神呪經一卷(亦云陀羅尼句)三紙陀隣尼鉢經一卷(亦云陀隣鉢呪)三紙東方最勝燈王如來經一卷(題云東方最勝燈王如來遣二菩薩送呪奉釋迦如來助護持世間經)十三紙善法方便陀羅尼經一卷六紙金剛祕密善門陀羅尼經一卷五紙護命法門神呪經一卷一十一紙無垢淨光大陀羅尼經一卷一十二紙請觀世音菩薩消伏毒害陀羅尼呪經一卷(亦直云請觀世音經)十二紙上十九經十九卷同帙。
translation: 觀自在菩薩隨心呪經一卷(亦名多唎心經十九紙)種種雜呪經一卷(或無經字)六紙佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(杜行顗奉制譯)七紙佛頂最勝陀羅尼經一卷(日照三藏譯)八紙佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(佛陀波利譯)七紙最勝佛頂陀羅尼淨除業障經一卷(日照三藏再譯)十三紙佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(義淨三藏譯或加呪字八紙)無量門微密持經一卷(一名成道降魔得一切智經)六紙出生無量門持經一卷(或云新微密持經)七紙阿難陀目佉尼呵離陀經一卷(或云出無量門持經)一十紙無量門破魔陀羅尼經一卷(或直云破魔陀羅尼經)一十一紙阿難陀目佉尼訶離陀隣尼經一卷一十紙舍利弗陀羅尼經一卷八紙一向出生菩薩經一卷一十二紙出生無邊門陀羅尼經一卷一十四紙勝幢臂印陀羅尼經一卷二紙妙臂印幢陀羅尼經一卷(別有一本十六七紙非是本經不可流布)二紙上十七經十七卷同帙無崖際持法門經一卷(一名無際經)一十五紙尊勝菩薩所問一切法入無量門陀羅尼經一卷(或直云尊勝菩薩所問亦云入無量門陀羅尼)十七紙金剛上味陀羅尼經一卷一十五紙金剛場陀羅尼經一卷一十四紙師子奮迅菩薩所問經一卷二紙華聚陀羅尼呪經一卷三紙華積陀羅尼神呪經一卷三紙六字呪王經一卷五紙六字神呪王經一卷六紙虛空藏菩薩問佛經一卷(亦云虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經亦云七佛神呪經)十二紙如來方便善巧呪經一卷十紙持句神呪經一卷(亦云陀羅尼句)三紙陀隣尼鉢經一卷(亦云陀隣鉢呪)三紙東方最勝燈王如來經一卷(題云東方最勝燈王如來遣二菩薩送呪奉釋迦如來助護持世間經)十三紙善法方便陀羅尼經一卷六紙金剛祕密善門陀羅尼經一卷五紙護命法門神呪經一卷一十一紙無垢淨光大陀羅尼經一卷一十二紙請觀世音菩薩消伏毒害陀羅尼呪經一卷(亦直云請觀世音經)十二紙上十九經十九卷同帙。

source_sentence: 內藏百寶經一卷(亦云內藏百品)八紙溫室洗浴眾僧經一卷(亦直云溫室經)三紙須賴經一卷十八紙私訶昧經一卷(或云私訶末經一名菩薩道樹經亦名道樹三昧經)十一紙菩薩生地經一卷(一名差摩竭經)三紙四不可得經一卷五紙梵女首意經一卷(一名首意女經)五紙成具光明定意經一卷(或云成具光明三昧經或直云成具光明經)二十二紙寶網經一卷(亦云寶網童子經)二十三紙菩薩行五十緣身經一卷(亦云菩薩緣身五十事經亦云五十緣身行經)六紙菩薩修行經一卷(亦云威施長者問觀身行經亦云長者修行經)七紙諸德福田經一卷(或直云福田經或云諸福田經)五紙大方等如來藏經一卷(或直云如來藏經)九紙佛語經一卷四紙金色王經一卷九紙演道俗業經一卷九紙百佛名經一卷六紙上十七經十七卷同帙。
translation: 內藏百寶經一卷(亦云內藏百品)八紙溫室洗浴眾僧經一卷(亦直云溫室經)三紙須賴經一卷十八紙私訶昧經一卷(或云私訶末經一名菩薩道樹經亦名道樹三昧經)十一紙菩薩生地經一卷(一名差摩竭經)三紙四不可得經一卷五紙梵女首意經一卷(一名首意女經)五紙成具光明定意經一卷(或云成具光明三昧經或直云成具光明經)二十二紙寶網經一卷(亦云寶網童子經)二十三紙菩薩行五十緣身經一卷(亦云菩薩緣身五十事經亦云五十緣身行經)六紙菩薩修行經一卷(亦云威施長者問觀身行經亦云長者修行經)七紙諸德福田經一卷(或直云福田經或云諸福田經)五紙大方等如來藏經一卷(或直云如來藏經)九紙佛語經一卷四紙金色王經一卷九紙演道俗業經一卷九紙百佛名經一卷六紙上十七經十七卷同帙。

source_sentence: 稱揚諸佛功德經三卷(亦名集諸佛花經一名集花經一名現在佛名經或四卷)五十七紙須真天子經三卷(亦云須真天子所問經亦云問四事經或二卷)四十六紙摩訶摩耶經一卷(一名佛昇忉利天為母說法經亦云摩耶經或二卷)二十六紙除恐災患經一卷一十七紙孛經一卷(或云孛經鈔)一十八紙觀世音菩薩受記經一卷(一名觀世音受決經一十三紙)上六經十卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra on the Merit of the Praiseworthy Buddhas (also known as the Sutra on the Merit of the Buddhas, the Sutra on the Merit of the Present Buddhas, or four volumes), the 57-page Sutra on the Merit of the True Son of God, or two volumes, the 46-page Sutra on the Merit of Mahāmāyā, or two volumes, the 17-page Sutra on the Removal of Fear and Disaster, or the 13-page Avalokitêśvara Sutra, or the Avalokitêśvara Sutra, or two volumes, the 18-page Avalokitêśvara Sutra of Acceptance of Knowledge, or thirteen volumes, and the ten volumes of the six sūtras listed above are all in the same volume.

source_sentence: 海龍王經四卷(或三卷)七十三紙
translation: Sutra of the Sea Dragon King, 4 rolls (or 3 rolls), 73 pages

source_sentence: 首楞嚴三昧經三卷(或二卷亦直云首楞嚴經僧祐錄云新首楞嚴經)五十二紙觀普賢菩薩行法經一卷(云出深功德經或無行法字亦云普賢觀經)一十六紙觀藥王藥上二菩薩經一卷(一十九紙)不思議光菩薩所問經一卷(亦云不思議光菩薩所說經亦云無思光孩童菩薩經)一十二紙上五經十卷同帙。
translation: 首楞嚴三昧經三卷(或二卷亦直云首楞嚴經僧祐錄云新首楞嚴經)五十二紙觀普賢菩薩行法經一卷(云出深功德經或無行法字亦云普賢觀經)一十六紙觀藥王藥上二菩薩經一卷(一十九紙)不思議光菩薩所問經一卷(亦云不思議光菩薩所說經亦云無思光孩童菩薩經)一十二紙上五經十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 十住斷結經十卷(最勝問菩薩十住除垢斷結經一名十千日光三昧定亦云十地斷結經或十一卷或十四卷)二百五十四紙諸佛要集經二卷(亦直云要集經天竺曰佛陀僧祇提)四十三紙未曾有因緣經二卷(或無因緣字度羅睺羅沙彌序)四十紙上三經十四卷二帙。
translation: Ten Fascicle Sutra on Cutting Off the Bonds of the Ten Stages (also called the Ten Thousand Suns Samadhi Sutra and the Ten Stages Cutting Off the Bonds of the Ten Stages of the Bodhisattva's Questions); Two Fascicle Sutra on the Essentials of the Buddhas; Forty-three Fascicle Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of the Unprecedented; Fourteen Fascicle Sutra on the Three Sutras; and Two Fascicle Sutra on the Forty-Fascicle Sutra.

source_sentence: 菩薩瓔珞經十二卷(一名現在報或十四卷或十六卷或十三卷)三百三十七紙超日明三昧經二卷(或直云超日明經或三卷)四十八紙上二經十四卷二帙。
translation: The twelve-fascicle Pusa yingluo jing (a present retribution scripture or fourteen or sixteen or thirteen fascicles), three-hundred-and-thirty-seven-page Chaosi ming sanmei jing, two fascicles (or just the Chaosi ming jing or three fascicles), forty-eight pages on two scriptures, fourteen fascicles, and two books.

source_sentence: 賢劫經十三卷(題云颰陀劫三昧晉曰賢劫定意經舊錄云賢劫三昧經或十卷或七卷一帙)一百九十二紙大乘經單譯一百三十一部二百九十三卷二十四帙大法炬陀羅尼經二十卷(二帙)二百九十八紙大威德陀羅尼經二十卷(二帙)二百六十八紙佛名經十二卷(或云十三卷或分為二十卷)二百五十三紙三劫三千佛名經三卷(莊嚴劫上賢劫中星宿劫下)五十九紙上二經十五卷二帙(上帙七卷下帙八卷)。
translation: 賢劫經十三卷(題云颰陀劫三昧晉曰賢劫定意經舊錄云賢劫三昧經或十卷或七卷一帙)一百九十二紙大乘經單譯一百三十一部二百九十三卷二十四帙大法炬陀羅尼經二十卷(二帙)二百九十八紙大威德陀羅尼經二十卷(二帙)二百六十八紙佛名經十二卷(或云十三卷或分為二十卷)二百五十三紙三劫三千佛名經三卷(莊嚴劫上賢劫中星宿劫下)五十九紙上二經十五卷二帙(上帙七卷下帙八卷)。

source_sentence: 五千五百佛名經八卷一百三十一紙
translation: Sutra of the Names of Five Thousand Five Hundred Buddhas in Eight Fascicle One Hundred Thirty-One Pages

source_sentence: 不思議功德諸佛所護念經二卷(或直云不思議功德經或四卷)三十七紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of Inconceivable Merit that the Buddhas Guard (or just the Sutra of Inconceivable Merit or four volumes) is thirty-seven pages and ten volumes of the two scriptures together.

source_sentence: 華手經十三卷(一名攝諸善根經亦名攝諸福德經或十一卷或十二卷或十卷一帙)二百二十九紙大方等陀羅尼經四卷(一名方等檀特陀羅尼經或無大字)六十三紙僧伽吒經四卷五十一紙力莊嚴三昧經三卷三十八紙大方廣圓覺修多羅了義經一卷二十七紙上四經十二卷同帙。
translation: Thirteen Fascicle Sutra of the Flower Hand (a scripture on the collection of good roots, also known as the scripture on the collection of merit, or eleven, twelve, or ten fascicles in one), two hundred and twenty-nine pages, four fascicles of the Dhammapada Dhāraṇī (a scripture on the donation of greatness, or without large letters), sixty-three pages, four fascicles of the Saṃghāṭa Sutra, fifty-one pages, three fascicles of the Samādhi Sutra of the Adorned Power, thirty-eight pages, one volume of the Dhammapada Dhāraṇī, twenty-seven pages, and twelve fascicles of the above four scriptures.

source_sentence: 觀佛三昧海經十卷(或云觀佛三昧經或八卷一帙)一百五十六紙大方便佛報恩經七卷一百二十六紙菩薩本行經三卷四十七紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: The ten-fascicle Guanfo sanmei hai jing (or Guanfo sanmei jing or eight fascicles in one) is one hundred and fifty-six pages, and the seven-fascicle, one hundred and twenty-six-page bodhisattva practice jing is three fascicles and forty-seven pages, while the upper two scriptures are ten fascicles in one.

source_sentence: 法集經六卷(或七卷或八卷)一百二十七紙觀察諸法行經四卷六十三紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: The Dharma Collection Sutra is six (or seven or eight) volumes and one hundred and twenty-seven pages in length, and the Sutra of the Observation of the Practices of the Dharma is four volumes and sixty-three pages in length, and the upper two scriptures are ten volumes in length.

source_sentence: 菩薩處胎經五卷(初云菩薩從兜術天降神母胎說廣普經亦直云胎經或八卷或四卷)一百十五紙弘道廣顯三昧經四卷(一名阿耨達龍王所問決諸狐疑清淨品亦名入金剛問定意經凡十二品或二卷)五十五紙施燈功德經一卷(一名然燈經)一十五紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Bodhisattva's Handling of the Womb, five volumes (first, the Bodhisattva descends from the Tuṣita Heaven into the mother's womb and explains the vast universal scripture; also, it's directly called the Womb Sutra or eight volumes or four volumes), one hundred and fifteen pages, four volumes of the Samādhi Sutra of the Vast Exposition of the Way (one Anavatapta, the Dragon King's Inquiry into the Purification of Doubts, also known as the Sutra of the Jingang Questions and Concentrations, twelve lessons or two volumes), one volume of the Sutra of the Merit of Giving Lanterns (one Rantan, the Lamp Sutra), one hundred and fifteen pages, and the three scriptures on top, ten volumes, all in the same book.

source_sentence: 央崛魔羅經四卷七十八紙
translation: Aṇgulimālīya-sūtra (Aṇgulimālīya-sūtra) 4 volumes of 78 pages

source_sentence: 無所有菩薩經四卷六十二紙
translation: Sutra of the Ubiquitous Bodhisattva in Four Fascicles of Sixty-two Sheets

source_sentence: 明度五十挍計經二卷(或無明度字或無五十字)四十紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: Mingdu wu-shih yuqie jing (either without the word Mingdu or without the word wu-shih) in two fascicles (either without the word Mingdu or without the word wu-shih) of forty pages, or the three sūtras in ten fascicles of the same text.

source_sentence: 中陰經二卷二十八紙
translation: Two Volumes and Twenty-eight Sheets of the Sutra of the Intermediate Aggregates

source_sentence: 大法鼓經二卷三十一紙
translation: Dharma Drum Sutra, 2 volumes and 31 sheets

source_sentence: 文殊師利問經二卷(亦直云文殊問經)五十一紙月上女經二卷(維摩詰之女)二十九紙大方廣如來祕密藏經二卷(二十四紙)上五經十卷同帙。
translation: Wenshushilian wen jing 2 rolls (also known as wenshushilian jing) 51 pages, Yue shangnü jing 2 rolls (Vimalakīrti's daughter) 29 pages, Dafang rulai mimi zang jing 2 rolls (24 pages), and the above five sūtras in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 大乘密嚴經三卷五十六紙
translation: Dasheng mimiyan jing sanshou wangwu wenyi wangjie wangjie wangjie wangjie wangjie wangjie wangjie wangjie wangjie

source_sentence: 占察善惡業報經二卷(亦名大乘實義經出六根聚經亦直云占察經亦名地藏菩薩經)二十八紙蓮華面經二卷二十三紙文殊師利問菩薩署經一卷(亦云文殊問署經)二十紙大乘造像功德經二卷(或一卷)二十一紙上五經十卷同帙。
translation: Two Fascicle Sutra on the Divination of the Effect of Good and Evil Actions (also known as the Mahāyāna Sutra of Real Meaning, from the Sutra on the Aggregation of the Six Faculties, also directly known as the Divination Sutra, and also known as the Sutra of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva), twenty-eight pages, two rolls of the Lotus-Sided Sutra, twenty-three pages, one roll of the Sutra on the Questions of Mañjuśrī to the Bodhisattva (also known as the Sutra on the Questions of Mañjuśrī to the Bodhisattva), twenty pages, two rolls (or one roll) of the Mahāyāna Sutra on the Merits of State-making, twenty-one pages, and ten rolls of the five scriptures above in the same volume.

source_sentence: 廣大寶樓閣善住祕密陀羅尼經三卷四十一紙一字佛頂輪王經五卷(亦名五佛頂經或四卷)一百二十一紙大陀羅尼末法中一字心呪經一卷一十四紙上三經九卷同帙。
translation: The Dhāraṇī of the Well-Established Secret of the Vast Jeweled Tower, three volumes of forty-one pages, the five volumes of the One-Syllable Wheel-Turning King Sutra (also known as the Five Buddha-Turning Sutras or four volumes), one hundred and twenty-one pages, and the one volume of the One-Syllable Heart Dhāraṇī of the Final Dharma, one fourteen pages, the three scriptures above, and nine volumes in the same book.

source_sentence: 大佛頂如來密因修證了義諸菩薩萬行首楞嚴經十卷一帙一百四十三紙大毘盧遮那成佛神變加持經七卷(亦云大毘盧遮那成佛經)一百三十五紙蘇婆呼童子經三卷(亦云蘇婆呼請問經或云蘇婆呼律或云蘇磨呼或二卷)四十九紙上二經十卷同帙。
translation: One hundred and forty-three paper sūtra on the miraculous empowerment of the Mahāvairocanâbhisa (also called the Mahāvairocanâbhisa Becoming Buddha Sutra), seven rolls (also called the Mahāvairocanâbhisa Becoming Buddha Sutra), one hundred and thirty-five paper sūtra on the child Sūbahu, three rolls (also called the Sūbahu Requesting Questions Sutra, or Sūbahu Vinaya, or Sūmahu, or two rolls), forty-nine paper, two sūtras, and ten rolls in the same volume.

translation: The Mouli maṇḍala sūtra in one volume (or without the sūtra characters) is a thirty-three paper sūtra that contains four volumes of recitation from the Vajraśekhara Yoga (also called a sūtra) and eighty-one paper sūtras.

translation: 七佛所說神呪經四卷(初卷云七佛十一菩薩說大陀羅尼神呪經)七十三紙大吉義神呪經二卷(或四卷)三十九紙文殊師利寶藏陀羅尼經一卷(一十七紙)金剛光焰止風雨陀羅尼經一卷(二十一紙)阿吒婆拘鬼神大將上佛陀羅尼經一卷(亦直云阿吒婆拘呪經)五紙阿彌陀鼓音聲王陀羅尼經一卷(四紙)大普賢陀羅尼經一卷三紙大七寶陀羅尼經一卷一紙六字大陀羅尼呪經一卷二紙安宅神呪經一卷(亦云安宅呪經)四紙摩尼羅亶經一卷(亦云摩尼羅亶神呪經)四紙玄師颰陀所說神呪經一卷(錄云幻師無所說字或作跋字亦云波陀古錄云幻士跋陀經)二紙護諸童子陀羅尼呪經一卷(亦云護諸童子請求男女陀羅尼經)四紙諸佛心陀羅尼經一卷三紙拔濟苦難陀羅尼經一卷二紙八名普密陀羅尼經一卷二紙持世陀羅尼經一卷四紙六門陀羅尼經一卷一紙清淨觀世音普賢陀羅尼經一卷(此經有一錯本應須審之)五紙上十九經二十三卷同帙。

source_sentence: 德光太子經一卷(一名賴吒和羅所問光德太子經一十九紙)大意經一卷五紙堅固女經一卷(一名牢固女經)六紙商主天子所問經一卷(或無所問字)一十七紙諸法最上王經一卷二十三紙師子莊嚴王菩薩請問經一卷(一名八曼荼羅經)五紙離垢慧菩薩所問禮佛法經一卷(六紙)受持七佛名號所生功德經一卷(四紙)佛臨涅槃記法住經一卷(或加般字)五紙寂照神變三摩地經一卷一十六紙差摩婆帝受記經一卷三紙不增不減經一卷(或云二卷者誤)七紙造塔功德經一卷二紙右繞佛塔功德經一卷(亦云繞塔功德經)三紙大乘四法經一卷(與重譯中日照出者名字雖同經體全異)八紙有德女所問大乘經一卷(時有一本可八九紙文錯不堪)四紙大乘流轉諸有經一卷三紙妙色王因緣經一卷四紙佛為海龍王說法印經一卷一紙師子素馱娑王斷肉經一卷四紙般泥洹後灌臘經一卷(一名般泥洹後四輩灌臘經亦直云灌臘經)二紙八部佛名經一卷(亦云八佛經)三紙上二十二經二十二卷同帙。

translation: Ten Fascicle Sutra of the Bodhisattva Stages (either no sūtra or a treatise also known as the Bodhisattva Precepts Sutra or eight fascicles in one), one hundred and eighty-six paper Sutra of the Bodhisattva Good Morality, nine fascicles (one of the Bodhisattva Stages or ten fascicles), one hundred and eighty paper Sutra of the Purification of Karmic Hindrances, one volume, one fifteen paper, and the upper two scriptures, ten fascicles in one.

source_sentence: 優婆塞戒經七卷(或五卷或六卷或十卷是在家菩薩戒)一百三十一紙梵網經二卷三十六紙受十善戒經一卷一十六紙上三經十卷同帙。
translation: The seven-fascicle (or five-, six-, or ten-fascicle) Sutra of the Upāsaka Precepts is composed of 131 pages, the two-fascicle, thirty-six-page Sutra of Brahmā's Net, and the one-fascicle, sixteen-page Sutra of the Ten Good Moral Practices is composed of the same ten-fascicle set as the three sutras above.

source_sentence: 菩薩瓔珞本業經二卷(或直云瓔珞本業經三十九紙)佛藏經四卷(一名選擇諸法經或三卷或二卷)七十紙菩薩戒本一卷(曇無讖譯)一十一紙菩薩戒本一卷(三藏玄奘譯)一十八紙菩薩戒羯磨文一卷六紙菩薩善戒經一卷(憂波離問菩薩受戒法)一十五紙上六經十卷同帙。
translation: The Pusa yingluo ben yezhang (or just the Yingluo ben yezhang of thirty-nine pages), the four-fascicle Fosang jing (a scripture on the selection of dharmas or three or two fascicles), the seventy-page Pusa jieben (a translation by Dharmakṣema), the eleven-page Pusa jieben (a translation by Sanzang Xuanzang), the eighteen-page Pusa jiekamo wen (a translation by Six Treasures), and the six-page Pusa shanjie jing (a translation by Upāli of the bodhisattva's rules for receiving the precepts), the fifteen-page Shangli jing and ten fascicles of the same text.
